response.content:
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F and grease two 8-inch round pans. Prepare cake pans for baking to ensure easy release.",
  "step2": "Mix 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 2 tsp baking powder, and 1 tsp salt in a large bowl. Whisk dry ingredients thoroughly to avoid lumps.",
  "step3": "Add 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 large eggs, and 1 cup whole milk to dry ingredients. Beat until smooth and well combined, scraping sides as needed.",
  "step4": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans and smooth tops. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.",
  "step5": "Allow cakes to cool in pans for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. This helps prevent sogginess.",
  "step6": "Once cool, frost with chocolate buttercream and assemble. Decorate as desired with chocolate shavings or sprinkles."
}
